dict.string: The simply furnished rooms feature Wi-Fi,flat-screen TVs,mini-fridges and private bathrooms with showers.A buffet breakfast is served in a simple restaurant.The hotel also has a business center and a conference room.
A modern hotel next to the SEB Arena sports and entertainment complex. Gediminas Tower is 6 km away, and Vilnius Train Station is 8 km away.
This high-rise hotel is located 6 km from Victory Park, 8 km from the National Art Museum of the Republic of Belarus and 7 km from the Church of St. Simeon and St. Helena.
Kriti Beach Hotel is located next to the Blue Flag beach of Rethymnon, a 5-minute walk from the Venetian Port. It features a heated pool, sauna, steam room and certified Greek breakfast.

Overlooking Lloret de Mar's beautiful coastline and great amenities, this 4-star hotel is located a short walk from the beach. The hotel is ideal for couples or families wishing to spend their holidays in a picturesque seaside resort.
Pau Casals 8-10, Lloret de Mar's, Spain

These include people who are passionate about the City of Lights, enthusiasts of Haute Couture or ready-to-wear, theatregoers, history buffs, opera aficionados, public bench lovers and many others who yearn for the many and varied pleasures of the French capital.
Olivia Balmes is located in Barcelona's elegant Eixample district, 400 meters from Passeig de Gracia. This modern hotel offers an outdoor pool, stylish air-conditioned rooms and a restaurant.

TH Roma - Carpegna Palace is 200 meters from Cornelia Metro Station (line A) in Rome. It offers free parking and rooms with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The grounds feature a lush garden with centuries-old trees.
